# ðŸŽ‰ Welcome to Your New Skill!

Thank you for using the Agent Skill NPM Boilerplate!

## ðŸ“‹ Next Steps

### 1. Customize Your Skill

Replace the following placeholders:

- [ ] `package.json`: Update `name`, `description`, `author`, `repository`
- [ ] `SKILL.md`: Update `name`, `description`, and add your logic
- [ ] `.claude-skill.json`: Update `name` and `package`
- [ ] `README.md`: Replace this file with your skill's documentation

### 2. Add Your Logic

Edit `SKILL.md` and add your skill's instructions in the "Instructions" section.

### 3. Test Locally

```bash
npm test
# or
node install-skill.js
```

### 4. Publish

```bash
npm login
npm publish --access public
```
